body.p: Gentoo 2006.0 release media are now available at the Gentoo store, writes this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. A community directory for Gentoo user groups and associations is being set up, two upcoming events and a report from last week's Chemnitzer Linuxtage conclude the Gentoo news from around the globe. The tips and tricks section is back with an article on how to transition from ifconfig to iproute2, and don't miss the Gentoo press clippings, the list of new developers on the team, security announcements and bugzilla statistics. Enjoy the GWN!
